title: Outreach Resources
desc: A selection of the wide range of resources used by our Malvani CBO and Targeted Intervention Centre (TI)

title: AIDS Progression Chart
desc: This chart is used to showcase activities which accelerate progression of AIDS

title: HIV Wheel of Choice
desc: Every layer of this wheel showcases a range of different life choices; including both safe sex practice and activities that lead to higher risk of HIV

title: Role Play Dolls
desc: Dolls used to represent a pimp, a boyfriend and a sex worker for educational role plays and scenarios
